description.en: Silk Stable is a private stablecoin tracking a basket of global currencies and commodities. Silk Stable is fast and agile, with 6-second transaction times. Launched by Shade Protocol and powered by Secret Network, Silk operates as an interoperability hub between global currencies – acting as a perpetual hedge against macro volatility and inflation.
